user_request: A romantic poem about two hearts beating as one.
final_poem:
In unison, our souls intertwine and merge  
With a rhythm that whispers like an ancient pledge; two hearts within one hearth.   
Not in competition but complemented by love’ endless surge,    
A symphony of affection we continuously wedge. 
Mirroring each other as the moon mimics earth's glow  
In this cosmic dance where only understanding knows; an intertwined tableau below and above.   
Eternal love that defies space-time, beyond our mortal coil’s cage    
Burnished bright in a timeless age - the echoes of passion engrave on life's page:  
A union founded upon trust with no boundary or wall;  an oath to each other we never brag.   
In every heartbeat, our story is told and re-told    
Through whispers in darkness where love grows cold - yet here within us forever enrobed:  
For you are my world without end's mould; a bond unbroken by time or fights.   
Our hearts beat as one, not with fear of losing the tune but instead find solace and grace in our shared delightful plight—our love transcending space into an eternal embrace’s trace!    
In unity we stand against life's relentless grind  
Two beating souls entwined, a symphony refine; for when two hearts do merge as one.
